organic_results.title: Olympic Sports List: What Are the New Sports for 2024 Paris Games?
organic_results.snippet: For 2020 in Tokyo, skateboarding, surfing, sport climbing, karate and baseball & softball were added as new Olympic sports. Sports also often add new disciplines, such as when BMX freestyle made its first appearance under the cycling umbrella in 2020.
